name: PUEBLO OF LAGUNA
sampleDescriptions: Support for tribal language immersion program; support for revision of Impact Aid formulas.
General Tribal Representation; advocate for pro tribal education policies; advocate for pro tribal housing with regard to Native American Housing and Self-Determination Act reauthorization.
Support for passage of the Tribal Labor Sovereignty Act, S. 63 and H.R. 986
Advocate for Bureau of Land Management land transfer to the Pueblo of Laguna.
Housing for the Native American Housing and Self-determination Act reauthorization.
